mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.name, g.update_dt, COUNT(t.group_id) there_count FROM tbl_there_group g LEFT JOIN tbl_there t ON g.id = t.group_id GROUP BY t.group_id ORDER BY group_order
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_there_group SET group_order = group_order + (${order}), update_dt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_there_group SET name = #{name}, update_dt = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_there_group (id, name, group_order, update_dt) SELECT #{id}, #{name}, MAX(group_order) + 1, NOW() FROM tbl_there_group
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.group_id, t.name, t.summary, t.background, COUNT(distinct i.info_id) info_count, COUNT(distinct tr.traffic_id) traffic_count FROM tbl_there t LEFT JOIN tbl_info i ON t.id = i.id LEFT JOIN tbl_traffic tr ON t.id = tr.id WHERE group_id = #{groupId} GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY name
